trans-unit.source: Represents the definition of the control property and its value.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件属性和其值的定义。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.SimplePropertyEntry> class represents simple properties or those properties that are not collections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.SimplePropertyEntry>类表示的简单属性或不是集合的那些属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ComplexPropertyEntry> class represents complex types such as collections.
Gets or sets the formatted string representation of the property entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置属性项的格式化字符串表现形式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> pertaining to the property entry.
trans-unit.target: 一个与属性项有关的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor.SetAttribute(System.String,System.String)" /> method should be called for the property during code creation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在代码创建过程中是否应为属性调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor.SetAttribute(System.String,System.String)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor.SetAttribute(System.String,System.String)" /> should be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor.SetAttribute(System.String,System.String)" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the property entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置属性项的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> containing the value of the property entry.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含属性项的值。
